Customized Cakes for Every Occasion

We offer a wide range of customization options to bring your cake vision to life. From selecting your favorite flavors, sizes, and designs to adding personalized decorations and special messages, our cakes are crafted with love and attention to detail. Celebrate your special moments with a cake that truly reflects your style and taste.

Convenient Delivery and Tracking

You can schedule your preferred delivery date and time slot during checkout. Plus, our tracking system allows you to stay updated on the status of your cake delivery, ensuring peace of mind and excitement as you eagerly await its arrival. Count on us to bring your cake right to your doorstep, so you can focus on making lasting memories.

Catering to Your Dietary Needs

We believe everyone deserves to enjoy delicious cakes, regardless of dietary restrictions or allergies. We provide detailed information about our ingredients, and we clearly indicate if our cakes are gluten-free, vegan, nut-free, or free from other common allergens. Your health and satisfaction are our top priorities.

Pricing

At Pretty Cake Shop, we believe in spreading happiness and making your cake ordering experience even more delightful. That's why we are excited to offer a variety of special offers and discounts that allow you to enjoy our delectable creations while keeping your wallet happy. Here are some ways we bring you extra value:

Single Cake

$25/cake

  • 1 cake of your choice
  • Customizable flavors and designs
  • Perfect for small gatherings
  • Free delivery within city limits

Celebration Bundle

$70/mo

  • 3 cakes of your choice
  • Customizable flavors and designs
  • Perfect for medium-sized parties
  • Free delivery within city limits

Grand Celebration

$150/mo

  • 5 cakes of your choice
  • Customizable flavors and designs
  • Perfect for large events
  • Free delivery within city limits
